title: I found... a good cringe video pertaining to /ALLCHAT
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yuc8efRzM5w

TL;DR(Watch)
:D!!!
LOVE EVERYTHING EVERYONE 
:D!!!
HATE NOTHING/NO ONE
:D!!!
Rito was too much work and as an independent contractor I have other obligations and felt it was in my best interest to leave*

*literally all she had to say but didn't. this video is almost 9 minutes of cringe word looping and roundabout nothingness.

try and even watch this, It just hurt to watch her try and talk.... and to think she is a streamer.... 

Even though I don't like /allchat it is good to see people making decisions based on their own best interests, and she probably should have considered writing a script of what she wanted to say or something. 

for an actual answer, it starts at 2:03 and ends at 2:30

this video could have been 27 seconds long.

just like this thread could have been 27 words long. :^)
